itunes:title: #53: Building Supportive Friendships for Healing
title: #53: Building Supportive Friendships for Healing
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: When it comes to healing intimacy disorders, you HAVE to have a good group of friends to support you. In this podcast episode, I talk about how to discern who would be healthy fits to support your journey. FREE DOWNLOAD  CONNECT WITH US...
